statements: SELECT * FROM encrypted_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT sensitive_data, encrypted_at_rest FROM encrypted_data WHERE encrypted_at_rest = TRUE;
SELECT id, sensitive_data FROM encrypted_data WHERE encrypted_in_transit = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM encrypted_data WHERE id > 3 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT sensitive_data FROM encrypted_data WHERE encrypted_at_rest = FALSE LIMIT 2;
SELECT * FROM encrypted_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, sensitive_data FROM encrypted_data WHERE encrypted_at_rest = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM encrypted_data WHERE encrypted_at_rest = FALSE ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, encrypted_at_rest, encrypted_in_transit FROM encrypted_data WHERE id BETWEEN 3 AND 5;
SELECT id, sensitive_data, encrypted_at_rest FROM encrypted_data WHERE sensitive_data LIKE '%credit%' LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM user_data;
SELECT username, email FROM user_data ORDER BY username;
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity FROM user_logs WHERE activity LIKE '%login%';
SELECT * FROM user_data;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_logs WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM user_data WHERE username LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(log_id) AS total_logs FROM user_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_logs > 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT encrypted_data FROM sensitive_data WHERE data_id = 10;
SELECT log_message FROM logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, encrypted_data FROM sensitive_data WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data JOIN users ON sensitive_data.user_id = users.user_id;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, log_message FROM logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS num_logs FROM logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_logs > 10;
SELECT id, data, timestamp FROM encryption_at_rest;
SELECT * FROM encryption_in_transit ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, username, email FROM user_privacy WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM data_breaches WHERE description LIKE '%security%';
SELECT id, data AS information, timestamp FROM encryption_at_rest ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, data, timestamp FROM encryption_at_rest WHERE id = 1;
SELECT data, timestamp FROM encryption_in_transit WHERE timestamp > '2020-01-01';
SELECT id, username, email FROM user_privacy WHERE username LIKE '%john%' ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_breaches WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, description FROM data_breaches WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT * FROM encrypted_users;
SELECT id, username, email FROM encrypted_users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT message_id, message_text FROM encrypted_messages WHERE receiver_id = 5;
SELECT attachment_id, message_id FROM encrypted_attachments ORDER BY attachment_id DESC;
SELECT log_id, log_date, log_message FROM encrypted_logs WHERE log_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM encrypted_users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT email, username FROM encrypted_users WHERE username = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM encrypted_logs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT message_text FROM encrypted_messages WHERE sender_id = 2 AND receiver_id = 1 ORDER BY message_id DESC;
SELECT attachment_id, message_id FROM encrypted_attachments WHERE attachment_data IS NOT NULL;
